Package main

Class MatchWindow

java.lang.Object
main.MatchWindow
public class MatchWindow extends Object
GUI for playing Matches. It shows the Player the two Teams and their scores, which Athletes are facing off against each other, and the current round. There are action buttons to proceed with each round, and a forfeit button that allows the player to leave at any point, at the cost of losing the Match.
Version:
1.10
Author:
mdi48, bsm62

  • Constructor Details

    • MatchWindow

      public MatchWindow(Match setMatch, int x, int y)
      Constructor that creates the window and adds all of the graphical elements. This displays the scores of both Teams, the current round, and creates buttons to perform actions.
      Parameters:
      setMatch - the match this window is representing
      x - used to inherit the horizontal position of the previous window
      y - used to inherit the vertical position of the previous window

  • Method Details

    • showFaceOff

      public static void showFaceOff(ArrayList<Athlete> playerTeam, ArrayList<Athlete> enemyTeam)
      Displays the Athletes currently engaging eachother. Calls drawTeam() method for both groups of athletes to creates rows in the top and bottom of the window.
      Parameters:
      playerTeam - the list of player athletes in the current faceoff.
      enemyTeam - the list of enemy athletes in the current faceoff.

    • drawTeam

      public static void drawTeam(ArrayList<Athlete> athleteList, ArrayList<AthletePanel> panelList, int rowHeight)
      Creates a row of AthletePanels at a specified height in the window.
      Parameters:
      athleteList - the list of athletes to draw
      panelList - the list of panels being updated
      rowHeight - the vertical position in the window of the row

    • updateLabels

      public static void updateLabels()
      Updates the scores of each Team, and the current round.

    • setStatus

      public static void setStatus(String status)
      Sets the text of status indicator at the top of the window. This is used to inform the player of what is happening in the Match.
      Parameters:
      status - the string to display

    • showStartButton

      public static void showStartButton()
      Shows the start button, hides the attack and defend buttons. Also updates the round number on the start button.

    • showAttackButton

      public static void showAttackButton()
      Shows the attack button, hides the start and defend buttons.

    • showDefendButton

      public static void showDefendButton()
      Shows the defend button, hides the start and attack buttons.

    • finish

      public static void finish()
      Finishes the match, showing the Player the result. Hides the action buttons and places the return button in their location.

    • getWindow

      public static JFrame getWindow()
